results.text: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth.
results.reason: This verse marks the beginning of creation, highlighting God's power and sovereignty.
results.reflection: Reflect on the majesty of God's creation and His authority over all things.

results.text: Now the earth was formless and empty, darkness was over the surface of the deep, and the Spirit of God was hovering over the waters.
results.reason: This verse describes the initial state of creation, emphasizing God's presence even in the void.
results.reflection: Consider how God brings order and purpose to chaos in our lives.

results.text: And God said, 'Let there be light,' and there was light.
results.reason: God's command brings forth light, symbolizing the power of His word and the beginning of life.
results.reflection: Trust in the transformative power of God's word to bring light into darkness.
